name: Portfolio
tagline: This page presents a portfolio of my previous work
body:
### Welcome
The content linked here goes back over a long career in eLearning. It is intended to provide some evidence of my ability as an Instructional Designer and Developer of custom eLearning content.

### ABN AMRO
This course on [Wealth Management](http://aaronesilvers.github.io/elearning/wealth_mgmt_original/) was created with Flash 7, HTML, JavaScript and is configured for SCORM v1.2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
